content.text: Hey there Chloe. I hope you don't mind me giving you a call, but I hear it's your birthday next week! Somebody told me you're about to go away for a few days to celebrate too. That's awesome! I bet you're more excited than Alan Partridge at the Norwich Radio Personality of the Year Awards!

Anyway, my name is Clo. Three Zero. And it's my job to keep you informed of what you're doing and when, during your time away. But first, I need to let you know where you're going to be staying for the next few days. I'll give you three clues to try to help you guess. Ready? Here's clue number 1
Ok, that was a bit tricky. Here's your next clue.
I bet you've already got it by now. But here's your final clue just in case you need it.

That's right! Adam's planned you an all-expenses paid trip to... ZIMBABWE!!! Oops, sorry I think that was a typo. I'm sure it's meant to say Scotland instead. Actually Edinburgh to be precise. He's got a lot of fun stuff arranged for you both. Look out for me throughout your visit. I'll be telling you what you've got coming up each day. Anyways, I'll let you get back to your packing. You've got an early start tomorrow. Have fun, and catch you later. Clo Three Zero signing off!
